project.name: nme
project.description: NME stands for Neko Media Engine and is an SDL wrapper for the haXe and Neko platforms. It also supports a subset of the flash9 drawing API, for vector and bitmap drawing.
project.version: Fix image bytes on iPhone. iPhone does not use freetype anymore. Fix DisplayObject.alpha. Move to nekoapi.ndll. Fixed TextFormat references. Added point size to draw points.
